paper_abstract: It has been shown that justification is an efficient technique that can be easily incorporated in heuristic algorithms (such as Hartmann's genetic algorithm and simulated annealing) for the resource-constrained project scheduling problem (RCPSP),and can improve the quality of the schedules generated by these algorithms. In this paper, double justification has been incorporated in the Particle Swarm Optimization(PSO) for the RCPSP. The computational results show that the PSO with double justification (DJPSO) is very efficient.
paper_title: Incorporating justification in the particle swarm optimization for the RCPSP
